data.title: Boston Celtics History

A Record of a Title

Ainge in the Spotlight

Back-to-Back Atlantic Titles

Celebration in 2008!

Fans stormed the court after the Celtics won their 17th NBA World Championship title while Ray Allen, James Posey, Kendrick Perkins and Tony Allen celebrated. As Boston’s first title in 22 years, for ...

Celtics Hall-of-Famers on a Basketball

Defense Leads the Way

Now A Big Five
